sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-qlsp', templateUrl: './qlsp.component.html', styleUrls: ['./qlsp.component.css'] }) export class QlspComponent { productList: { name: string, price: number }[] = []; addProduct(product: { name: string, price: number }) { this.productList.push(product); } }
Tạo mới khách hàng Thêm danh mục In dữ liệu

Product List

  • {{ product.name }} - {{ product.price | currency }}

Add Product
